items.name: Veg Dhansak
items.description: A wholesome Parsi dish made of mix vegetables and lentils cooked together with fresh spices and topped with fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad

items.name: Chicken Salli Curry
items.description: A popular Parsi chicken dish that consists of tender pieces of chicken cooked in a flavorful and aromatic curry, often accompanied by "sali" or crispy potato straw fries. The chicken curry is typically rich and well-spiced, creating a delicious contrast with the crunchy texture of the sali.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kheema Pattice
items.description: A popular Parsi dish featuring spiced minced meat (kheema) encased in mashed potatoes, shaped into patties, and shallow-fried until golden brown, creating a delicious blend of savory flavors and textures. (4 pieces)

items.name: Akoori
items.description: A Parsi-style spiced scrambled eggs dish made with onions, tomatoes, green chilies, and aromatic spices. Served with 2 pav

items.name: Navratna Korma
items.description: A rich dish made with assorted mix of veggies and nuts in a creamy gravy with spices. A flavourful comfort for your soul.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Muglai Chicken Curry
items.description: A rich and flavorful curry featuring tender chicken cooked in a creamy and aromatic sauce. The sauce is made with a luxurious blend of ingredients such as cream, yogurt, nuts, and aromatic spices, creating a dish known for its indulgent taste and royal Mughlai influence.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chapli Kebab
items.description: A popular dish featuring ground chicken mixed with spices, herbs and gram flour, shaped into round patties and pan-fried until crispy. (4 kebab)

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices and topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Golyachi Aamti
items.description: Spiced besan combined with ginger garlic paste, onions and more, made into balls, dunked in tamarind based spicy gravy
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Kolapuri Kala Lamb Sukka
items.description: A dish from Kolhapur cuisine known for its bold and spicy flavors. This dish often involves marinating lamb with a blend of robust spices, including black cardamom, black pepper, and a variety of other aromatic ingredients.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Masala Bhat
items.description: Rice cooked with onion, tomato, potato and other vegetables with spices and garnished with coriander

items.name: Kathal Biryani
items.description: Jackfruit cooked with a special spice blend and layered with partially cooked basmati rice, allowing the flavors to meld together with the rice. Served with a side of yogurt raita and papad.

items.name: Chicken Berry Pulao
items.description: A popular Parsi dish that is a delicious blend of sweet and savory flavors. The dish is made with fragrant basmati rice, tender chicken, and a variety of aromatic spices. The pulao is then topped with a mix of sweet and tangy berries, caramelized onions, and nuts, giving it a beautiful and unique taste. Served with raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Chole Tikki Chat
items.description: A popular Indian street food that combines spicy and tangy chickpeas (chole) with crisp potato patties (tikki), topped with yogurt, chutneys, and various garnishes. (2 tikki)

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste and fresh garam masala

items.name: Veg Chowmein
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with assorted veggies cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Chicken Chowmein
items.description: Indo-Chinese stir fry made with assorted veggies and chicken and cooked together with rice and noodles in flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Veg Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Shallow fried spiced mashed potato wrapped in whole wheat flatbread with onions and frankie masala. Served with green chutney.

items.name: Tomato Rice
items.description: Rice cooked with onions & tomato, tempered with mustard seeds, peanuts and fresh curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Amritsari Pinde Chole
items.description: A Punjabi delicacy where chickpeas are cooked in a robust blend of spices, creating a flavorful and hearty curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 batura + side salad + achar

items.name: Meat Beliram
items.description: A mouth-watering delicacy of the Punjabi cuisine and was curated by Chef Beli Ram. The lamb is cooked using the finest meat, yoghurt, ghee, ginger, garlic, onion, and a melange of whole and ground spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Honey Chilli Potatoes
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese appetizer or snack. Deep-fried potato wedges or fries are tossed in a sweet and spicy sauce made with honey, soy sauce, chili sauce, and other seasonings.

items.name: Chole Chawal
items.description: A classic North Indian dish featuring flavorful chickpea curry served with aromatic steamed rice, creating a hearty and satisfying meal.

items.name: Boror Tenga
items.description: A delightful vegetarian dish with lentil fritters, retaining the tangy and flavorful broth made with tamarind, resulting in a delicious and satisfying vegetarian version of this traditional Assamese curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Masor Tenga
items.description: A traditional Assamese fish curry known for its sour and tangy flavor.  Made with fish, tomatoes, and yam, it is seasoned with mustard seeds and fenugreek seeds.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Ghugni
items.description: A popular street food and snack in India. Made from dried peas that are cooked with spices, including cumin, coriander, turmeric, and served with tamarind chutney, chopped onions, and green chilies.

items.name: Mati Dal
items.description: A cherished Assamese dish, features black gram roasted for a unique earthy flavor. Enjoyed with rice, this dal is a distinctive and essential part of Assamese cuisine.

items.name: Avial
items.description: A comforting dish from Kerala. Mix veggies cooked in coconut and yogurt based thick gravy tempered with spices and fresh curry leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Beef Varattiyath
items.description: A flavorful and spicy Kerala dish made with beef. The beef is typically slow-cooked with a mix of spices, coconut, and other aromatic ingredients until it reaches a rich and dry consistency.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Plain Uttapam
items.description: Plain uttapam is a South Indian pancake made from rice and urad dal batter fermented overnight and griddled to perfection. Served with coconut chutney and sambar. It is a savory and slightly tangy breakfast dish with a soft, thick texture. (2 uttapam) *Order before noon previous day to prepare the batter.

items.name: Kootu Curry
items.description: A mixed vegetable curry made with ingredients like black chickpeas, yam, plaintain, coconut, and various spices. Served with rice.

items.name: Paneer Makhni Biryani
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in a thick creamy buttery gravy of onion, tomato, cashew, ginger and garlic and then layered with aromatic basmati rice, caramalised onion, coriander, mint and slow cooked. Served with a side of yogurt dip + papad

items.name: Lucknowi Biryani
items.description: Also known as Awadhi Biryani, is a famous biryani variant originating from the city of Lucknow in Uttar Pradesh. It is known for its unique cooking style, fragrant basmati rice, and tender lamb marinated in aromatic spices. The biryani is cooked in the dum pukht style, where the meat and rice are slow-cooked together to absorb the flavors fully. It is garnished with fried onions and fresh mint, resulting in a rich and flavorful dish.

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki
items.description: Spiced sweet potato patty shallow fried and served with spicy green chutney. (4 tikkis)

items.name: Lasuni Palak Kichidi
items.description: A flavorful and nutritious Indian dish that combines spinach (palak) and rice (kichidi) with a prominent garlic (lasuni) flavor. The dish is prepared by cooking rice and spinach together with a tempering of garlic, cumin seeds, and other spices

items.name: Veg Chowmein
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with assorted veggies cooked together with rice and noodles with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Chicken Chowmein
items.description: Indo-Chinese stir fry made with assorted veggies and chicken and cooked together with rice and noodles in flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Rasam Rice
items.description: A comforting dish from the south of India. Tomato, tamarind, garlic, cumin cooked together with homemade rasam powder for a soupy consistency. Served with rice and papad.
